meta.title: Geo Data Merger
meta.description: A data merger for json, csv, geojson and topojson files.

sections.title: Add your Data Sets
sections.subtitle: We can handle json, csv, geojson, topojson files. We don't upload your data. Everything stays in your browser.

sections.title: Select Keys
sections.subtitle: Choose the keys for merging the data.

sections.title: Result
sections.subtitle: Check out the result to see if everything worked as expected.

sections.title: Select Output Fields
sections.subtitle: Choose which data should be included in your final result.

sections.title: Download
sections.subtitle: Download the merged data as csv, json, geojson ot topojson (in case the base is geo data).
